name: Santa Alcoholic 2000
description:
Santa drank too much and crashed his sled, now he needs to find all the lost presents before christmas is ruined

Old school 3D platformer with trash controls and graphics - Made in 1 week

Controls:

  • WASD / Arrow Keys - Move
  • Spacebar - Jump
  • 1 - 2 Switch Camera
  • F - Kick
  • Q - Secret ability
